name: Infernal Ascent (Brackeys Game Jam)
description:
Note: This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1.

Story: There's a person mining through a deep dark cave, then suddenly, he accidentally struck into some lava, gushing through the ground. the person runs away from the lava as far as he could, but there was a dead end in his path. now the only way he can get out of here alive, is to dig upwards.
